metadata.description: Turn any repo into a self-improving agent environment.

plugins.name: agent-onboarding
plugins.description: Turn any repo into a self-improving agent environment. Guided 7-phase onboarding produces CLAUDE.md, INTENT.md, PROJECT_BRIEF.md, SPEC_INVENTORY.md, and a full SPECS/ directory. Installs a self-improving runtime that tracks friction, logs errors, and generates structured improvement proposals.
